meanings.definition: In the interest of; for the benefit of.
meanings.sent1: She spoke on behalf of her friend at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: He donated money on behalf of the charity.
meanings.sent3: On behalf of the cookies, the milk decided to join the party.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone brightly on behalf of the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The teacher smiled on behalf of the students' hard work.

meanings.definition: As a representative of; on the part of.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer acted on behalf of his client in court.
meanings.sent2: She signed the contract on behalf of the company.
meanings.sent3: On behalf of the cat, the dog tried to meow but failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: The captain sailed the ship on behalf of the entire crew.
meanings.sent5: The mayor accepted the award on behalf of the city residents.
